Name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
Description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

Name: Cosmo Queen
Description: Queen of the galaxies and mistress of the stars.

Name: Dark Magician
Description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

Name: Fence Guard
Description: It is he who keep a close watch to keep the evil intruders away.

Name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon
Description: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

Name: Gaia The Fierce Knight
Description: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

Name: Summoned Skull
Description: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters this monster boasts considerable force."

Name: Fence Guard Magician
Description: A magician girl who uses her magic to protect fence guards.

Name: Dark Magician Girl
Description: Gains her skill by learning from her master the Dark Magician"

Name: Curse Of Dragon
Description: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

Name: Fence Guard Dragon
Description: A fierce creature unleashed on those who threatens the peace of the innocents.

Name: Alexandrite Dragon
Description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not."

Name: Vorse Raider
Description: This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.

Name: Gemini Elf
Description: Elf twins that alternate their attacks.

Name: Fence Guard Apprentice
Description: Trains very hard to be the future Fence Guard

Name: Beta The Magnet Warrior
Description: When the three magnet warriors are combined they make an unstoppable force.

Name: Alligator Sword
Description: dis mighty lissard man can swing his sword so fast dat it's more dan da speed a sound!

Name: Gamma The Magnet Warrior
Description: When the three magnet warriors are combined they make an unstoppable force.

Name: Celtic Guardian
Description: An elf who learned to wield a sword he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

Name: Alpha The Magnet Warrior
Description: When the three magnet warriors are combined they make an unstoppable force.

Name: Harpie Lady
Description: This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle.

Name: Big Shield Gardna
Description: A perfect choice when defense is your only option.

Name: Witty Phantom
Description: Dressed in a night-black tuxedo this creature presides over thedarkness.

Name: Baby Dragon
Description: Much more than just a child this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

Name: Cyber Jar
Description: This monster from outer space might pack unusual surprises.

Name: Clown Zombie
Description: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.

Name: Time Wizard
Description: Controls the flow of time to alter the outcome of the duel.

Name: Man-Eater Bug
Description: A bug with the ability to devour humans.

Name: Kuriboh
Description: Even though it doesn't seem like much Kuriboh will always be there when needed the most.

Name: Mokey Mokey
Description: An outcast angel. Nobody knows what he is thinking at all. Sometimes he gets mad and that is dreadful.
